net.gini.android.vision

Class GiniVisionFeatureConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.gini.android.vision.GiniVisionFeatureConfiguration
  • Deprecated. 
    Use GiniVision.newInstance() and the returned GiniVision.Builder instead.

    public class GiniVisionFeatureConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    Using this class the features of the Gini Vision Library can be configured.

    Use the builder by invoking GiniVisionFeatureConfiguration.buildNewConfiguration() to configure and create a new instance.
